Articles.Content:
My first post in this forum. Started to play KSP last week, 16 hours atm and lot of fun

Just reading and discovering about ksp, some wikis and scott manley videos, trying to learn and improve my skills/knowledge of KSP. I can say that this game is what I was looking for

cheers and thx for your time

Hi, welcome on the true KSP forum .

You'll find plenty of helpful tutorials and people here, it's a great community we have, hope you'll like your stay.

Welcome to the forums!

Since you mentioned that you're looking for ways to improve your skills, you may want to check out some of the tutorials I've managed to collect in the Drawing Board, which is conveniently linked through my signature. I try to keep an eye out for some of the better ones in the community.
thx for the welcome and for the info, I really appreciate it
